verses.name: Jeremiah 5:1
verses.text: Run ye to and fro through the streets of Jerusalem, and see now, and know, and seek in the broad places thereof, if ye can find a man, if there be any that executeth judgment, that seeketh the truth; and I will pardon it.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:2
verses.text: And though they say, The Lord liveth; surely they swear falsely.

verses.name: Jeremiah 5:3
verses.text: O Lord, are not thine eyes upon the truth? thou hast stricken them, but they have not grieved; thou hast consumed them, but they have refused to receive correction: they have made their faces harder than a rock; they have refused to return.
